"use client";import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import Input from'../../input';import{toHexFormat}from'../color';import{generateColor}from'../util';const hexReg=/(^#[\da-f]{6}$)|(^#[\da-f]{8}$)/i;const isHexString=hex=>hexReg.test("#".concat(hex));const ColorHexInput=_ref=>{let{prefixCls,value,onChange}=_ref;const colorHexInputPrefixCls="".concat(prefixCls,"-hex-input");const[hexValue,setHexValue]=useState(value===null||value===void 0?void 0:value.toHex());// Update step value
